entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 5.5°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: 5.5°C

Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 4.9°C

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning this afternoon. Drizzle over northern sections. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of drizzle or rain. Temperature steady near 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Showers ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections late in the morning and in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Very windy. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
